| Standing Woman with Water Jug            | ca. 1845 - 1847                         |             |               | +-------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+-------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+ | +--------------------------+ | graphite and watercolor on paper         | The Huntington Library, Art              | 98.30.7    | http://emuseum.huntington.org/object/ | http://emuseum.huntington.org/object/ | Even though Kensett and Casilear were    | http://emuseum.huntington.org/internal/ |
|                                          |                                         |             |               | | John Frederick Kensett              | http://emuseum.huntington.org/person/          | American    | 1816       | http://emuseum.huntington.org/person/           | 1816-12-31        | 1816-01-01          | 1872       | http://emuseum.huntington.org/person/           | 1872-12-31        | 1872-01-01          | | | NA                       | |                                          | Collections, and Botanical Gardens.      |            | 98.30.7                               | 98.30.7/production                    | not in Rome at the same time, the        | media/dispatcher/18168/resize:          |
|                                          |                                         |             |               | |                                     | john-frederick-kensett                         |             |            | john-frederick-kensett/birth                    |                   |                     |            | john-frederick-kensett/death                    |                   |                     | | +--------------------------+ |                                          | Gift of Michael St. Clair                |            |                                       |                                       | similarities between their figure        | format$003dfull                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               | +-------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+-------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+ |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | studies show that they were working      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | from the same costumes, props, and       |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | models. Many of the American painters    |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | who studied in Italy during the          |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | mid-nineteenth century included          |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | costumed figures in their landscape      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | paintings. Ten years after Kensett left  |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | Rome, American artists were continuing   |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | the practice, demonstrated by the        |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | costume studies by Albert Bierstadt      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | (1830-1902) illustrated below.           |                                         |

|                                          |                                         |             |               | | Charles Demuth                      | http://emuseum.huntington.org/person/          | American    | 1883       | http://emuseum.huntington.org/person/           | 1883-12-31        | 1883-01-01          | 1935       | http://emuseum.huntington.org/person/           | 1935-12-31        | 1935-01-01          | | | NA                       | |                                          | Collections, and Botanical Gardens.      |            | 2003.17                               | 2003.17/production                    | dynamic paintings of fire engines and    | media/dispatcher/21517/resize:          |
|                                          |                                         |             |               | |                                     | charles-demuth                                 |             |            | charles-demuth/birth                            |                   |                     |            | charles-demuth/death                            |                   |                     | | +--------------------------+ |                                          | Gift of Margery and Maurice Katz         |            |                                       |                                       | grain elevators done in a Precisionist   | format$003dfull                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               | +-------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+-------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+------------+-------------------------------------------------+-------------------+---------------------+ |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | style similar to that of Charles         |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | Sheeler (whose work is on view           |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | elsewhere in this gallery). However, he  |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | also loved New York and adopted the      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | city's nightlife as one of his           |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | subjects. In Vaudeville: Two Men he      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | used vivid colors and a sensuous, fluid  |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | style to depict a painted backdrop and   |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | suggest the movement of two dancers      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | from a variety show. A deft stroke of    |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | the artist's pencil gives the dancer on  |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | the left a witty wink.                   |                                         |

|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | costumed figures in their landscape      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | paintings. Ten years after Kensett left  |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | Rome, American artists were continuing   |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | the practice, demonstrated by the        |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | costume studies by Albert Bierstadt      |                                         |
|                                          |                                         |             |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                              |                                          |                                          |            |                                       |                                       | (1830-1902) illustrated below.           |                                         |
